title: San Juan County, Washington - Private Property

sections.title: Farm House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** 260833006000 (23.74 acres - Shady Cove LLC) - [View on Polaris GIS](https://gis.sanjuancountywa.gov/polaris/)

### Structure & Exterior
- **Type:** Wood-frame farmhouse with traditional root cellar (built into hillside)
- **Exterior:** Wood siding with distinctive green/teal trim
- **Roof:** Gray asphalt shingles with dormers

### Kitchen Appliances
- **Refrigerator:** LG LRTP0931W (8.6 cu. ft. compact top-freezer) - *Rec. Replace: 2028*
- **Range:** Premier Electric (4-burner coil cooktop)
- **Amenities:** No dishwasher, microwave, or laundry facilities

### Electrical System
- **Panel:** MTS electrical panel in dining room with generator transfer capability
- **Circuits:** Complete handwritten directory available

### Heating System
- **Type:** Electric baseboard heating (multiple zones)

### Septic System
- **Pump:** On "DINING - SEPTIC" circuit

### Water Heater
- **Model:** Bradford White MI150S6DS21
- **Serial:** ZB2783563
- **Age:** 25 years (Feb 2001)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK (Expected life 8-12 years)
- **Action:** Replace immediately

subsections.title: Water Heater (Critical)
subsections.content:
### ⚠️ URGENT: Replacement Needed
**Bradford White Water Heater**
- **Model:** MI150S6DS21
- **Serial:** ZB2783563
- **Age:** 25 years (Feb 2001)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK

**Why This Is Urgent:**
At 25 years old, this unit is more than double its expected lifespan. Risks include catastrophic tank failure, flooding, and safety hazards.

**Immediate Actions:**
1. Check daily for leaks.
2. Listen for unusual noises.
3. **Schedule replacement immediately.**

sections.title: Beach House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** [To be documented] - [View on Polaris GIS](https://gis.sanjuancountywa.gov/polaris/)

### Utilities & Systems
- **Water Shutoff:** Exterior access box near main entry by "Lighthouse Point" sign (Blue-handled ball valve)
- **WiFi:** Network: **Ned&Haleh** | Password: **Beachhouse1**
- **Security:** First Alert FA260 Professional alarm system

### Appliances
- **Refrigerator:** LG LRBP1031T (19 years old) - *Rec. Replace Immediately*
- **Range:** Bosch Electric (Stainless steel, ceramic cooktop)
- **Dishwasher:** Bosch 300 Series SHP53C06UC30 (~7 years old)
- **Washer:** Maytag MHW8200FC0 (8 years old)
- **Dryer:** Maytag MED8200FC2 (8 years old)

### Water Heater
- **Model:** Bradford White M265R6DS-1NCWM
- **Serial:** DD9041943
- **Age:** 22 years (2004)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK (Expected life 8-12 years)
- **Action:** Replace immediately

subsections.title: Water Heater (Critical)
subsections.content:
### ⚠️ URGENT: Replacement Needed
**Bradford White Water Heater**
- **Model:** M265R6DS-1NCWM
- **Serial:** DD9041943
- **Age:** 22 years (2004)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK

**Why This Is Urgent:**
At 22 years old, this unit is significantly beyond its expected lifespan. Risks include tank failure, flooding, and loss of hot water.

**Immediate Actions:**
1. Monitor for leaks.
2. **Budget for immediate replacement.**

sections.title: The Chalet
sections.content:
**Status:** Documented

### Heating & Comfort
- **Heating:** Cadet Electric Wall Heater (Model: CS102, 1000W/240V)
- **Stove:** Propane Heating Stove
- **Thermostat:** Wall-mounted dial control

### Kitchenette
- **Refrigerator:** Danby Designer (Compact under-counter model)
- **Microwave:** Countertop model
- **Sink:** Single basin stainless steel

### Systems
- **Water Heater:** Rheem 30 Gallon Electric (Model: 81V30D)
- **Electrical:** Square D Load Center (Sub-panel located in utility closet)

### Maintenance Notes
- **Winterization:** Ensure wall heaters are set to frost protection (approx. 45°F) during winter months.
- **Water Heater:** Drain 1-2 gallons annually to remove sediment.

sections.title: Camp Kitchen
sections.content:
**Status:** Documented

### Structure
- **Type:** Open-air timber frame pavilion with metal roof
- **Flooring:** Concrete slab
- **Lighting:** Overhead string lights and task lighting

### Cooking Facilities
- **Grill:** Weber Genesis II (Propane, 3-burner)
- **Stove:** Portable 2-burner propane camp stove
- **Prep Area:** Large stainless steel prep table

### Utilities
- **Water:** Outdoor sink with cold water supply only (Must be winterized/drained in freezing months)
- **Electrical:** Multiple outdoor-rated GFCI outlets for small appliances (coffee maker, blender, etc.)

### Maintenance Notes
- **Winterization:** Shut off water supply and drain lines to prevent freezing. Cover grill.
- **Propane:** Check tank levels before large gatherings.
